name: The Seaside Is Infinite
description:
Made for Mini Jam 108

INSTRUCTIONS

Left Mouse Button to INTERACT

Right Mouse Button to CANCEL BUILD

Mouse Wheel to ZOOM

CREDITS

Music by Strange Drew

Sound Effects from Sonniss

Sprites from Kenney

Old Man from a drawing in "A Colonial Tramp: travels and adventures in Australia and New Guinea" Hume Nisbet, 1891
